alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:59AM MST until February 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Eagar- Springerville, Ganado, Kayenta, Pinetop-Lakeside, Saint Johns, Shonto, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow-covered road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to noon Today: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Chinle 0 to 1 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 2 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Kayenta 1 to 2 inches Pinetop-Lkside 1 to 3 inches Saint Johns 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Show Low 1 to 2 inches Whiteriver 1 to 2 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
